item.title: AD LDS w/ ADAM Sync for jamf Pro
item.description: Introduction Let’s say that you are standing up an on prem jamf Pro server for your organization. This is a big undertaking. There are a ton of things to consider. One of the core pieces of functionality that you will probably want, is to be able to scope policies and software items to existing active directory groups used by your organization. This is a fairly straightforward goal to achieve on the surface, you just put your active directory details into jamf Pro and away you go.
